overview: Cyrus currently serves as Chief Technology officer for Sookbox. He is focused on designing and implementing the programming for the Sookbox platform. He leads the development team. Prior to Sookbox, Cyrus led numerous research projects, including “Observation of Long-Range Near-Side Angular Correlations in Hadronic Interactions” – which was a large scale computer analysis of collisions and Monte Carlo simulations of the Collider at CERN. He also designed a simulation of cosmic radiation on a journey to Mars. Cyrus is on sabbatical to work full time at Sookbox from MIT where he majors in nuclear engineering.
